author: smilerosepool
title: Creating a Bilingual Website Hub
description: There are not enough websites directly connecting the English and Japanese speaking Cardano communities with needed information and links.
solution: We will create a website that hosts text and video in both languages and offer "bounties" for content, along with monthly Zoom calls.
experience: We are already conducting monthly Zoom meetings in both languages. One proposer is an SPO in Japan and the other a US-based CNFT artist.
